thread.section_title: The Ampersand Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Experience
thread.title_full: Excellent Experience - Review of The Ampersand Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Gail L
title: Excellent Experience
text: Hotel is in a good location near the tube and lots of reasonably priced good restaurants near by. Staff is very helpful and friendly. Rooms are small but well appointed and included a smart phone that you could use during your stay. Nice restaurant in cellar area and afternoon tea in the lobby. Highly recommend.
